title: Sampler, 1746
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave
inscribed: Urania Louth her work in the ninth year of her age 1746
dimensions: Frame H x W: 47 x 22.9 cm (18 1/2 x 9 in.)
creditline: Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers
description: A shepherd and shepherdess, doe and buck, hunter, flower urn, trees, birds, and a verse within a heart; with a vine border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1746.
1746. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave. Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers. 2003-14-6.
